translation.en: You guys, just start without me.
translation.zh: 你们 别管我 先上去
终于可以 心如止水了
我们的较量五百年前就结束了

translation.en: Well, now I'm ready for a rematch.
500 years in the Spirit Realm, you pick up a thing or two.
translation.zh: 在灵界待了五百年 好歹学了几招

translation.en: I have taken the chi of every master here. -No! -Yes.
translation.zh: -我已经收走了这里所有大师的气-不会吧

translation.en: And soon I will have your power, too.
translation.zh: 没错 而且我很快也会收走你的气

translation.en: When will you realize? The more you take, the less you have.
translation.zh: 你什么时候才能够领悟取之越多失之越多？

translation.en: With your chi, I will finally be able to return to the mortal world.
translation.zh: 有了你的气 我就终于可以重返凡界

translation.en: And this time, you won't be there to stop me.
translation.zh: 而这次 就算是你也无能为力

translation.en: It was never my destiny to stop you.
I have set another on that path.
translation.zh: 我把这个重任托付给了别人

translation.en: Then I will find him... and take his chi, too.
translation.zh: 那我就找到他 也夺走他的气

translation.en: Justice is about to be served!
We'll have two Justice Platters, please. -Um, three. -Three.
Oh, the spicy noodle soup for Tigress. Did you want extra sauce with that?
translation.zh: 再来一个香辣面给娇虎你要多加酱料吗？

translation.en: She wants it on the side.
Go, Dragon Warrior! You can do it!
translation.zh: 加油 神龙大侠 你能行

translation.en: Go, Dragon Warrior! Defend the Valley!
translation.zh: 冲啊 神龙大侠 保卫村庄

translation.en: You guys aren't doing the Dramatic Pose, are you?
translation.zh: 你们这该不会是气震山河之势吧

translation.en: Do we have to strike a pose every time we land?
translation.zh: 咱能不每次出场都摆个造型吗？

translation.en: You guys, never underestimate the power of a dramatic entrance.
translation.zh: 各位 绝不要低估了盛大出场的威力

translation.en: I've heard about some masters who can win a fight just by throwing open a door.
translation.zh: 听说某些大师出场的阵仗之大 光靠开门亮相就能闪瞎对手

translation.en: Master Shifu. The Dragon Warrior is correct.
Really? I was just making, uh... Yeah. I mean, yeah. I am.
translation.zh: 是吗？我只是在瞎说对 没错 我说得对

translation.en: Before the battle of the fist comes the battle of the mind.
translation.zh: 在交战之前 意念已经开战
因此 出场要有阵势

translation.en: Nice dramatic entrance. What's the occasion?
translation.zh: 好大的阵势啊 今天是啥日子？

translation.en: Today will be my final class.
translation.zh: 今天将是我最后一次授课

translation.en: I didn't even know you were sick! Although you have been looking a little...
translation.zh: 我都不知道您生病了虽然您看起来好像一直有点儿

translation.en: -I'm not sick. -Healthy. A little healthy. A lot, actually.
translation.zh: -我没病-健康 很健康 您看上去非常健康

translation.en: My final class, because from now on your training will be in the hands
translation.zh: 为什么说是最后一堂课？因为从现在起 就由神龙大侠来负责教你们练功了
就由神龙大侠来负责教你们练功了

translation.en: Me, teach? I mean, why not Tigress?
translation.zh: 我？教课？为什么不是娇虎呢？

translation.en: She's always telling everyone what to do.
translation.zh: -她一直挺爱指挥大家的呀-闭嘴 阿宝

translation.en: -Be quiet, Po. -You see what I mean?
translation.zh: -她一直挺爱指挥大家的呀-闭嘴 阿宝 你看你看

translation.en: Tigress is not the Dragon Warrior. You are.
translation.zh: 娇虎不是神龙大侠 你才是

translation.en: Come on, they're the Five. What could I teach them?
translation.zh: 别闹了 他们可是五侠啊我能教他们什么呀？

translation.en: There is always something more to learn, even for a master.
translation.zh: 功夫是永无止境的 哪怕对师夫也是

translation.en: For instance, let me show you another move...
translation.zh: 比如 我再来教你一招
他都走了 还客气啥
我们静候您的点拨 师父

translation.en: All you have to lose is our respect.
translation.zh: 教得不好 我们顶多鄙视你

translation.en: I mean, seriously, how bad can it be?
translation.zh: 嗨 没事 能差哪儿去啊
真差 真是超级超级差 啊

translation.en: Okay, okay. Let's switch it up.
translation.zh: 好了好了 咱们正式开始
金猴 来一个不动如山

translation.en: I mean, ah... Tigress, Tornado Back Flip!
translation.zh: 对不起 娇虎 旋风后空翻

translation.en: Crane, go high. I mean low! Low!
translation.zh: 上去 仙鹤 我是说 下去

translation.en: Viper and Tigress, do, like, a Totem Pole Poison Technique!
translation.zh: 好了 灵蛇和娇虎 来一招虎踞龙盘

translation.en: Uh, you two, do a Swarming Insect Bite
translation.zh: 你们俩 来一个白鹤亮翅 野蜂乱舞

translation.en: with a Yellow Tail, Yellow Jacket, Spicy Tuna...
translation.zh: 来一个白鹤亮翅 野蜂乱舞 再来一个排山倒海 斗转星移对不起

translation.en: Did you at least learn a little something?

translation.zh: 是的 领悟到您不是这块料

translation.en: And Tigress is flammable, it turns out.
[goose 1] Yeah, that was a complete disaster.
translation.zh: 怎么会是这样呢？这简直就是个灾难

translation.en: [goose 2] Ugh... I'm glad we're not Po right now.
translation.zh: 还说呢 阿宝真够丢人的

translation.en: What a loser! [goose 2] What was Shifu thinking?
translation.zh: 真是一无是处也不知道师父怎么想的

translation.en: Uh, he said you're a loser.
How was your first day teaching?
translation.zh: 第一天当老师感觉如何？

translation.en: Who told you? Did Tigress tell you?
translation.zh: 谁告诉你的？娇虎打小报告了？

translation.en: I heard from Monkey, and Crane, and Mantis, and your dad, and Mrs. Chow from the gift shop,
translation.zh: 我是听金猴、仙鹤、螳螂、你爸礼品店的周大姐

translation.en: and those ducks you just passed, and Tigress told me.
translation.zh: 和刚才路过的鸭子说的当然 娇虎也说了

translation.en: Did she also tell you that it'll never happen again? Because I'm done.
translation.zh: 那她有没有告诉你这是最后一次了？因为我受够了

translation.en: Both! I don't know why you ever thought I could teach that class.
translation.zh: 两个都是你怎么会以为我当得了老师呢？
哦 我早就知道你不行

translation.en: What? You set me up to fail? Why?
translation.zh: 什么？你故意害我出糗？为什么啊？

translation.en: If you only do what you can do, you will never be more than you are now.
translation.zh: 如果你只做自己能力范围之内的事情就永远没法进步

translation.en: I don't wanna be more! I like who I am.
translation.zh: 可我不想进步啊我觉得我现在挺好的

translation.en: You don't even know who you are.
translation.zh: 你连自己是谁都不知道

translation.en: What do you... Of course, I do. I'm the Dragon Warrior.
translation.zh: 什么？我当然知道啦我是神龙大侠呀

translation.en: And what exactly does that mean, Dragon Warrior?
translation.zh: 那么神龙大侠到底意味着什么？

translation.en: It means, you know, just going around and punching and kicking.
translation.zh: 意味着 我要四处闯荡 拳打脚踢

translation.en: You think that is what the great Master Oogway saw for you?
translation.zh: 你以为伟大的乌龟大师看中你的是这点吗？
难道五百年前的预言成真

translation.en: so you could spend your days kicking butt
translation.zh: 就只是为了让你整天拳打脚踢

translation.en: and running through town high-fiving bunnies?
translation.zh: 陪猪大婶卖萌 跟兔子耍帅？

translation.en: Oogway saw greatness in you, Po.
More than you can see in yourself.
translation.zh: 但是他比你想象的还要器重你
有一种神功在等待你去学习

translation.en: Power beyond anything you can imagine.
translation.zh: 这种神功完全超出了你的想象
哇 这是什么神功啊？

translation.en: The energy that flows through all living things.
translation.zh: 气功是流经世界一切生灵的能量

translation.en: So you're saying if I teach, I'll be able to do cool stuff like that?
translation.zh: 你的意思是 等我当了老师之后就能练这个酷炫的神功啦？

translation.en: No. I'm saying if you teach, I'll be able to do cool stuff like that.
translation.zh: 不 等你当了老师之后我就有空练这个酷炫的神功了

translation.en: Mastering chi requires mastery of self.
translation.zh: -哦-掌握气功首先需要控制自己

translation.en: Oogway sat alone in a cave for 30 years asking one question.
translation.zh: 乌龟大师在一座洞穴里打坐三十年 只为思考一个问题 我是谁？
只为思考一个问题 我是谁？

translation.en: I'm lucky if I get five minutes before you interrupt...
translation.zh: 而我能有一刻不被你打搅就不错了

translation.en: [groans] So now I have to sit alone in a cave for 30 years?
translation.zh: 啊 那我得一个人在山洞里呆上三十年啊
终有一天 在你当好老师之后

translation.en: Teaching? There's no way I'm ever gonna be like you.
translation.zh: 可当老师这事儿 我怎么也成不了你那样啊

translation.en: I'm not trying to turn you into me.
I'm trying to turn you into you.
Wait a second, that makes no...

translation.zh: 我明白了 师父越好的老师说话就越玄乎

translation.en: Just a little more confusing and you'll be the next Oogway.
translation.zh: 我明白了 师父越好的老师说话就越玄乎 你快赶上乌龟啦

translation.en: Oh, ah... Sorry, no offense, Master Oogway. I just...
translation.zh: 哦 对不起 别见怪 乌龟大师

translation.en: I'll let you get back to your eternal peace.
translation.zh: 您还是继续修炼心境吧

translation.en: If I stepped on you, would you die?
translation.zh: 如果我踩上你一脚 你会死吗？

translation.en: You hear that, Oogway? I'm back.
translation.zh: 你听到了吗？乌龟 我回来了

translation.en: Kai. General Kai. Supreme Warlord of all China.
translation.zh: 天煞 天煞将军 神州第一统帅

translation.en: The Jade Slayer. Master of Pain.
translation.zh: 翡翠之刃 苦难之源

translation.en: You may know me as the Beast of Vengeance.
translation.zh: 至少你应该听说过复仇之兽？

translation.en: Okay, I used to work with Oogway.
translation.zh: 好吧 我以前跟乌龟是战友

translation.en: -Oh, Master Oogway! -Master Oogway! Now, he was a great warrior.
translation.zh: 早说呀 乌龟大师啊他可是名副其实的大侠
-好吧 够了够了 闭嘴-乌龟大师呀 您倒早说呀

translation.en: Find Oogway's students, and bring them to me.
translation.zh: 把乌龟的徒弟们抓来见我

translation.en: By the time I am done with them, Oogway,
translation.zh: 等我收走了他们的气 乌龟

translation.en: there will be no one left who will even remember your name.
translation.zh: 这世上就没人记得你的名字了

translation.en: Teach me? Oh, no! It's the Dragon Teacher!
translation.zh: 你教我？哦 你是神龙大侠吗？

translation.en: Yeah, he's so handsome! Thank you for the compliment.
translation.zh: 他简直帅呆了 您太客气了

translation.en: Ah! No! Please don't teach me to death!
translation.zh: 哦 你会把我活活给教死的

translation.en: I was just, uh, stopping by for a little soak.
translation.zh: 我只是顺道回家洗个澡
说吧 出什么事了？ -没事儿-没事？

translation.en: Nothing? I come home to find you taking a bath with your dolls...
translation.zh: -没事儿-没事？ 那为什么我一回家就看见你拿着娃娃在洗澡？

translation.en: ...and instead of adding bath salts to the water, you just added Szechuan peppercorns.
translation.zh: 况且你往洗澡水里加的还不是浴盐 而是辣椒面儿

translation.en: There, there, son. You tell your daddy all about it.
translation.zh: 好啦好啦 儿子有什么不顺心的事 跟爸爸谈谈

translation.en: Shifu says I don't know what it means to be the Dragon Warrior.
translation.zh: 师父说我还不懂得当神龙大侠的真谛

translation.en: Now I have to be a teacher?
I thought I finally knew who I was. If I'm not the Dragon Warrior, who am I?
translation.zh: 我还以为自己终于找到了真我 如果我不是神龙大侠那么我又是谁呢？

translation.en: [exclaims] Po, that's a promotion! Take the job, son!
translation.zh: 这可是个好差事啊那你就别犹豫了儿子

translation.en: And, someday when you're in charge of the whole Jade Palace
translation.zh: 等有一天你接管了整个翡翠宫时

translation.en: I can sell noodles in the lobby!
translation.zh: 我就在大堂里开一家面馆

translation.en: Why are you still here taking a bath like a baby?
translation.zh: 你怎么还有空在这儿像娃娃一洗澡啊？

translation.en: Get out! Get up! Go, go, go!
translation.zh: 起来 干活去 去 去
翡翠宫以后的分店就靠你了呀

translation.en: But what about the Dragon Warrior look-alike contest?
translation.zh: 那个 那神龙大侠模仿大赛怎么办？

translation.en: Oh, Mrs. Chow always wins that.
And the Dragon Warrior dumpling-eating contest?
translation.zh: 可还有神龙大侠吃包子大赛呢

translation.en: I have to defend my title.
No one's gonna beat your dumpling-eating record.
translation.zh: 没人能打破你吃包子的记录啦

translation.en: Someone's about to beat your dumpling-eating record!
translation.zh: 有人要打破你的吃包子记录啦

translation.en: [all] Go! Go! Who's eating my dumplings?

translation.zh: 是啊 这是很久以前的事了

translation.en: I hope you find your son.
And I hope you find your father.
translation.zh: 我也希望你早点找到你爸爸

translation.en: Oh, my gosh, it is you!
translation.zh: 我的天哪 真是你啊

translation.en: Well, don't just stand there. Give your old man a hug!
translation.zh: 傻孩子 你还站着干什么？快来抱抱你老爸

translation.en: I thought I lost you forever, Little Lotus.
translation.zh: 我还以为我再也找不到你了我的小莲花

translation.en: Uh, okay. This is very embarrassing but I think you've got me confused
translation.zh: 好吧 这下有点尴尬了 你好像认错儿子了 我不叫小莲花

translation.en: with a panda named Lotus. My name is Po.
translation.zh: 你好像认错儿子了 我不叫小莲花 我叫阿宝

translation.en: Oh, right, you wouldn't know. Okay.
See, Little Lotus was the name you were given at birth.
translation.zh: 这么说吧 小莲花是你刚出生的乳名

translation.en: I can't believe it! After all these years, you're really here?
translation.zh: 真不敢相信这么多年以后你居然出现了？

translation.en: Oh, Dad! Come! Say hi to...
translation.zh: 哦 老爸 快来见见

translation.en: I don't know what I'm supposed to call you.
translation.zh: 呃 我不知道该怎么叫你

translation.en: I'm pretty sure he said his name is Li.
translation.zh: 他刚刚不是说了么 他姓李

translation.en: Thank you, thank you, for taking such good care of my son.
translation.zh: 谢谢你把我儿子照顾得这么好

translation.en: Your son? Now, hold on just a minute.
How do we know this stranger is even related to you?
translation.zh: 我们怎么能确定你这个 陌生人跟他就有血缘关系呢？

translation.en: -Our bellies could be brothers! -That is so cool.
translation.zh: -你看我们的大肚子多像啊-酷

translation.en: Hey, son, let me teach you how to belly gong.
translation.zh: 儿子 来 我教你怎么肚子对对碰

translation.en: -All right. Belly gong. -They jiggle the same!
translation.zh: -对对碰-它们晃起来都是一样的
-对对碰-它们晃起来都是一样的 我们就好像照镜子似的

translation.en: [Li] It's like looking in a fat mirror.
translation.zh: 我们就好像照镜子似的

translation.en: I can't believe we're taking a picture together.
translation.zh: 真想不到还能跟你合影
不是 这什么情况啊？

translation.en: I thought Po was the only panda left.
translation.zh: 我还以为阿宝是仅剩的一只熊猫呢

translation.en: Oh, no. There's a whole bunch of us.
translation.zh: 啊不是 我们还有一大群吶

translation.en: A secret panda village in the mountains.
translation.zh: 在山里的一个神秘熊猫村

translation.en: But how did you know where I was?
translation.zh: 可你怎么知道我的下落的？

translation.en: I received a message that led me here.
translation.zh: 我一收到消息就找过来了

translation.en: How could you receive a message if no one could find you?
translation.zh: 既然都没人能找到你们你又是怎么能收到消息呢？

translation.en: No, it was a message from the universe.
translation.zh: 不 是从宇宙传来的消息

translation.en: Now, what's all this about a Dragon Warrior?
translation.zh: 你这个神龙大侠又是怎么一回事儿？

translation.en: How did you know I was a Dragon Warrior?
translation.zh: 你怎么知道我是神龙大侠的？

translation.en: Did the universe tell you that, too?
No, the poster did. And the gift shop.
translation.zh: 没有啊 是海报上写的 还有礼品店 我还买了个小杯子
还有礼品店 我还买了个小杯子

translation.en: You have no idea. There's so much to show you.
translation.zh: 对了 我跟你说我有好多好东西要给你看

translation.en: You're gonna be so awesomely proud. Come on, come on!
translation.zh: 你一定觉得非常骄傲的 来 跟我来
我一直都很为你骄傲的

translation.en: Do you have panda asthma, too?
translation.zh: 你也有熊猫哮喘综合症吗？

translation.en: Does that run in the family?

translation.zh: 老爸 你肯定会喜欢这个地方的

translation.en: It's, like, the coolest thing ever.
This is the Hall of Heroes.
Home of the most priceless kung fu artifacts in all of China!
translation.zh: 陈列着中国武林中所有的无价之宝

translation.en: Whoa! This place is... Awesome? Were you gonna say...
You were gonna say "awesome," right? Because it totally is!
translation.zh: 你想说帅呆了对吧？因为确实如此
-没错-但是你一定要超级小心
因为这里全都是易碎品

translation.en: Like the Urn of Whispering Warriors.

translation.zh: 以前就有人把它打碎过

translation.en: This is Master Flying Rhino's battle armor!
translation.zh: 这是飞天犀牛大师的战甲

translation.en: I wonder if I could fit in that.
translation.zh: 我不知道我能不能穿得下这个呢

translation.en: Get out of my head, Dad! I've wondered the same thing!
translation.zh: 天哪 老爸 我原来也想过这件事情

translation.en: -If I could fit in it? -If you could? No, if I could fit.
translation.zh: -你也想过让我试试-你 啊不 我是说自己试试
哦 老爸 快来看这个

translation.en: Master Ram's crossbow, the infamous Gate Smasher.
translation.zh: 公羊大师的弩 臭名昭著的破门利器

translation.en: Dad, look at this! The battle helmets of Master Rat's army.
translation.zh: 还有这个 老鼠大师军队的战盔

translation.en: Master Dolphin's waterproof armor! This is my favorite.
translation.zh: 海豚大师的防水盔甲 我的最爱

translation.en: Check it out. It's the legendary battle rickshaw of Emperor Hawk.
translation.zh: 还有这个传说中飞鹰之王的人力战车

translation.en: Dad, what are you doing? We're not supposed to touch anything!
translation.zh: 老爸 你干嘛呢？这东西不能随便乱碰的

translation.en: Oh! Sorry, sorry. Should I put it back?
translation.zh: 对不起 那我应该放回去吗？
感觉怎么样？关节能动吗？

translation.en: Do the hinges hinge? Does it smell like rhino?
translation.zh: 感觉怎么样？关节能动吗？ 有没有闻到犀牛的味道？有没有感觉自己坚不可摧？

translation.en: Does it feel like you're impenetrable?
translation.zh: 有没有闻到犀牛的味道？有没有感觉自己坚不可摧？

translation.en: Does it feel like you could take on a thousand warriors and emerge unscathed?
translation.zh: 有没有感觉自己能击溃千军而毫发无损？

translation.en: I wonder what this does. I should pull it.
translation.zh: 这是什么东西啊？我拉一下试试

translation.en: I think I just peed a little.
Anything else we should try in here, son?
translation.zh: 这里还有什么好玩的吗 儿子？

translation.en: Here we go! Go, go, go! Awesome! Faster, faster, faster.
-I'm going high! -There you go. Come on, throw it!
Bring it on, Master Rhino. Here I come!
translation.zh: -犀牛大师 放马过来吧-我来抓你啦

translation.en: I'm gonna get you. I am gonna get you!
I'm gonna get you, I'm gonna get you!
Who's got you? Who's gonna get you?
translation.zh: 撞你的小屁屁 撞你的小肚肚

translation.en: Who's gonna get you? Yeah. Who's gonna get you?
translation.zh: 撞你的小屁屁 撞你的小肚肚 撞你的小肚肚

translation.en: Guys, guys. You're never gonna guess who just showed up.
translation.zh: 各位 你们绝对想不到是谁来啦

translation.en: Not in a million years. You... You just try.
translation.zh: 你们做梦都想不到你们猜猜 他是谁？

translation.en: Whoa! How did you just guess that?
translation.zh: 啊 你们怎么猜到的？

translation.en: Oh, wait a second. Yeah, of course. We look exactly the same.
translation.zh: 哦 好吧 当然 我们长得一模一样

translation.en: Dad, say hi to my friends.
translation.zh: 老爸 跟我的朋友来打个招呼

translation.en: Mantis, Tigress, Monkey, Crane, and Viper.
translation.zh: 螳螂、娇虎、金猴、仙鹤 还有灵蛇
-你是灵蛇 对吧？-我是金猴 叔叔

translation.en: They're kind of my best friends. And this...
translation.zh: 他们是我最要好的朋友
还有这位 这位是师父 传奇人物

translation.en: Uh... It is an honor to meet you, Master Panda.
translation.zh: 很荣幸见到您 熊猫大师

translation.en: Perhaps your father would care to join us in the training hall.
translation.zh: 请你父亲去练功堂看看吧

translation.en: Your son will be teaching the class.
translation.zh: 您儿子要开始教学生啦

translation.en: I'm sure he's tired. I'm sure you're tired. He's tired.
translation.zh: 他肯定是累了你肯定是累了 他累了

translation.en: I'm gonna show him to the Chrysanthemum Suite. What, tired? No, I'm fine.
translation.zh: -我带他去菊香阁-累？我不累啊 我很好

translation.en: I would love to watch you teach.
Trust me, it'll be more fun just to watch me... -[gongs sounding] -Fight!
translation.zh: 相信我 你还不如看我们…开打啦
-这是什么声音？-村子被袭击了

translation.en: Now you can see what being the Dragon Warrior's all about!
translation.zh: 这下你就能见识到神龙大侠的神奇武功啦

translation.en: Enemies of justice, prepare for war!
translation.zh: 神龙大侠来也 准备吃我一招 这什么玩意儿？

translation.en: What's the deal with the green guys?
translation.zh: 这群绿了吧唧的家伙是谁啊？

translation.en: It's okay, Dad, I do this every day!
translation.zh: 没事 老爸 我早就习惯啦

translation.en: The Master Badger Twins, with their Crushing Double-Gong technique!
translation.zh: 双雄獾 他们的绝招是双锣齐敲

translation.en: And that guy is... No! Master Porcupine!
translation.zh: 那个人是 不会吧 豪猪大师

translation.en: I thought he died a hundred years ago.
translation.zh: 他不是一百年前就死了吗？

translation.en: Get a quick sketch of us.
Did you get it? Did you get it?
I'm being choked by Master Porcupine. This is so cool.
translation.zh: 我被豪猪大师掐住脖子了 帅呆了

translation.en: I'll give you a message from the universe.
translation.zh: 宇宙怎么不给你报销伙食费啊

translation.en: Sorry, Dad. I'll clean up later.
translation.zh: 对不起 老爸 一会我帮你收拾

translation.en: Whoa, whoa, whoa! Not my good pan! Take this one.
translation.zh: 别用我的好锅 给你这个

translation.en: Dad, check out my Dumplings of Doom.
translation.zh: 爸 看我这招包林弹雨

translation.en: Your chi will soon be mine.
translation.zh: 你的气马上就是我的了

translation.en: -Is he talking to me? -Which one? They're all talking.
translation.zh: -他在跟我说话吗？-哪个？他们都在说话

translation.en: Whoa. You're right. That's so scary.
translation.zh: 哇 你说得对 好恐怖啊

translation.en: We should try that, too. Maybe it'd be scary back at them.
translation.zh: 我们也该学学这招说不定能吓唬吓唬他们

translation.en: Okay, but we gotta plan what we're gonna say first.
translation.zh: 行 可是我们得先商量好怎么说

translation.en: Otherwise, it won't be scary. It'll just be stupid.
translation.zh: 否则不但不吓人 还会被当成傻帽

translation.en: It's not them talking, you idiots!
translation.zh: 否则不但不吓人 还会被当成傻帽 这群白痴 不是他们在说话

translation.en: It's me talking through them. Kai!
translation.zh: 是我天煞在借助他们说话

translation.en: The green smoke, just poof! And then poof!
translation.zh: 化作一缕青烟 嗖 就没了

translation.en: There's so much wisdom in here, I can't find anything. Yes!
translation.zh: 这么多卷轴得找哪辈子去 哦 有了

translation.en: All the answers will be found within.
Are you kidding me? Not again.

translation.zh: 等等 稍等 抱歉
哦 好吧 找到了

translation.en: It is written in Oogway's hand.

translation.zh: 很久以前 我有一个兄弟

translation.en: "in arms. In arms." Sorry. He says, "Brother-in-arms."
translation.zh: 战友 他说的是兄弟般的战友

translation.en: Maybe you should just unroll it all at once?
translation.zh: 你一下全摊开不就完了嘛

translation.en: "I was an ambitious young warrior leading a great army."
translation.zh: 我曾是一个统帅千军雄心万丈的年轻大侠

translation.en: And fighting by my side was Kai... my closest friend.
translation.zh: 我与天煞并肩作战 情同手足
直到有一天 我们遭遇了埋伏

translation.en: My friend carried me for days, looking for help...
translation.zh: 天煞背着我日夜奔波 四处求医

translation.en: until we came to a secret village high in the mountains.
translation.zh: 我们终于来到了一座藏于高山的神秘村庄

translation.en: Pandas who used the power of chi to heal me.
translation.zh: 熊猫用气功治好了我的伤

translation.en: They taught me how to give chi.
But Kai wanted the power all to himself.
translation.zh: 但天煞却想把神功据为己有

translation.en: He saw that what could be given could also be taken.
translation.zh: 他发现气既能被给予 也能被夺走

translation.en: until, finally I banished Kai to the Spirit Realm.
translation.zh: 后来天煞终于被驱逐到了灵界

translation.en: Should he ever return to the mortal realm,
he can only be stopped by a true master of chi.
translation.zh: 只有真正的气功大师才能够阻止他
真正的气功大师 就像你

translation.en: Me? I can barely make a flower bloom.
translation.zh: 我？我也就会发功开个小花

translation.en: I need at least 30 more years, and a cave.
translation.zh: 我至少还得修炼三十年

translation.en: [Shifu] He will continue stealing the chi of masters until he has consumed it all.
translation.zh: 不收走所有大师的气他是不会罢手的

translation.en: [Viper] We have to think of a way to stop him!
[Crane] He'll get more and more powerful with every master he defeats.
translation.zh: 每打败一位大师他就会变得愈加强大

translation.en: [Tigress] There is no choice. We fight.

translation.zh: 当然啦 我是熊猫啊

translation.en: That must be why the universe sent you here!
translation.zh: 宇宙一定就是为了这个才派你来的

translation.en: Okay, so what do I have to do?
translation.zh: 好吧 我该怎么做呀？

translation.en: You have to come home with me. What?
Yes, son. You must rediscover what it is to be a panda.
translation.zh: 是的 儿子你得重新领悟做一只熊猫的真谛

translation.en: You have to learn to live like a panda, sleep like a panda,
translation.zh: 你要学着像熊猫一样的生活像熊猫一样的睡觉

translation.en: I've always felt like I wasn't eating up to my full potential.
translation.zh: 我就一直觉得我在吃这方面还有潜力没开发出来

translation.en: No, you can't take Po away from me. No, no.
translation.zh: 你不许把我们家阿宝带走
你没戏 不能听你一面之词

translation.en: Shifu, open another scroll or something.
translation.zh: 师父 再打开一个卷轴什么的
就没有人帮我说句话吗？

translation.en: Dad, you heard what Shifu said Oogway said.
translation.zh: 老爸 你也听见师父和乌龟的话了

translation.en: This guy can only be stopped by a master of chi.
translation.zh: 只有真正的气功大师才能够阻止他

translation.en: And I can only master chi by knowing who I really am.
translation.zh: 我也只有找到自我才能掌握气功

translation.en: I'll pack you a lunch for the road.
translation.zh: 我给你们带点包子路上吃

translation.en: Do you really think Po can master chi in time?
translation.zh: 您真的认为阿宝能一下子学会气功？

translation.en: It only matters what the universe thinks.
Master, what are we going to do?
translation.zh: 师父 我们要怎么办？

translation.en: You are going to find out where Kai is.
Follow the trail of those jade creatures. But do not engage
translation.zh: 跟着翡翠僵尸 但不要和他们过招

translation.en: for with every foe he faces, Kai becomes stronger.
translation.zh: 每经过一次较量 天煞就愈加强大

translation.en: Why me? Is it because I asked?
translation.zh: 为什么选我？是因为我多了句嘴吗？

translation.en: No. It is because you can fly. Go!
translation.zh: 不 是因为你会飞 去吧

translation.en: Should have kept your beak shut. [chuckles]
[Shifu] And take Mantis. What? Oh, man. Is it because I...
-Ah... You don't need to ask me twice. -[muffled] Ow.

translation.zh: -你在这儿干嘛呢？-你说我干嘛呢？

translation.en: What am I doing? Getting a backache.
translation.zh: -你在这儿干嘛呢？-你说我干嘛呢？ 你要颠死我了

translation.en: Did you have to step on every rock?
translation.zh: 你一定要踩着石头走路吗？

translation.en: No, I mean, why are you here?
translation.zh: 不是 我是问你跟来干嘛呀？

translation.en: What was I supposed to do, huh?
What if the pandas don't have food you like?
translation.zh: 万一熊猫村吃的不和你胃口可怎么办？

translation.en: You're never gonna be able to save the world on an empty stomach.
translation.zh: 到时候 那你饿着小肚肚怎么去拯救世界呀

translation.en: I consider my presence mission critical.
translation.zh: 你说他能离得开我吗？你说呀
哦 对了 说起这事

translation.en: We can't share the location of the village with others. So...
translation.zh: 说起这事我们不能告诉外人熊猫村在哪儿

translation.en: Well, you think I can't keep a secret, huh?
translation.zh: 呃 你嫌我嘴不严 是吗？

translation.en: I raised Po for 20 years before I finally told him he was adopted.
translation.zh: 我养了阿宝二十多年才告诉他他不是我亲生的

translation.en: Okay. I guess it would be cruel to make you fly back.
translation.zh: 好吧 让你飞回去的话也太残忍了

translation.en: Sure looks like a long ways up there.

translation.zh: 走吧 咱们还是回家吧

translation.en: We're pandas. We don't do stairs.
translation.zh: 我们可是熊猫啊 我们才不爬台阶呢

translation.en: I've waited my whole life to hear those words.
translation.zh: 我这辈子就等这句话呢

translation.en: This is the secret panda village?
translation.zh: 这就是你们的神秘熊猫村呐

translation.en: No wonder you keep it a secret.
If I lived here, I wouldn't tell anyone either.
translation.zh: 要是换我住在这我也不好意思告诉别人
李山 乡亲们 李山回来啦
乡亲们 李山回来啦
他成功了 我们跑什么啊？

translation.en: Everyone! Everyone, gather around! This is my son!
translation.zh: 乡亲们 快过来 这是我儿子
乡亲们 快过来 这是我儿子 你好 瞧这帅哥

translation.en: -I'm Meng Meng. -I'm Shuai Shuai. -Your fur is soft. -He smells like cookies.
translation.zh: -我是萌萌 你的毛好软-我是帅帅 他闻起来像吃的

translation.en: He's so handsome, just like his father.
translation.zh: 他好帅啊 跟他老爸一个样

translation.en: Thank you. Son, these are your cousins.
translation.zh: -谢谢夸奖-儿子 这是你两个表哥

translation.en: Dim and Sum. I have cousins!
translation.zh: -乒乒 乓乓-我还有表哥呢
-热烈 热烈欢迎-哇 包子串

translation.en: We call it a snacklace. That's right.
Ah... We'll make you another one.

translation.zh: -是你啊-哦 真不错 你好

translation.en: I don't know who you are.

translation.zh: 哇 花娃娃 好漂亮呀

translation.en: Okay, careful with that. That's my action figure.
translation.zh: 哦 好吧 小心点 那是我的人偶

translation.en: ...problem. Of course. Yeah. That's why I brought her.
translation.zh: 当然没问题 就是带来送给你的

translation.en: -Take good care of her. -Yes! Stripy Baby. [giggles]
You look just like me, but a baby.
translation.zh: 你长得跟我一样 就是年纪小点
你长得跟我一样 就是年纪大点
你长得跟我一样 就是胖了点

translation.en: You're like me, but... with a hat.
translation.zh: 你长得跟我一样 就是戴了个帽子

translation.en: Let's feast in my son's honor.

translation.zh: -什么情况？-熊猫不用走 我们用滚的

translation.en: Have you ever seen anyone look so ridiculous?
translation.zh: 我说阿宝 你见过这么不靠谱的吗？

translation.en: Po, what are you doing? Po!
You're right, that is better than walking.
translation.zh: 你说得没错 确实比走路强多啦

translation.en: Yeah, that's the good stuff. Have some dumplings.
What kind of panda doesn't know how to roll?
Well, I'm kind of new at this whole "being a panda" thing.
translation.zh: 当熊猫这事我还真是不太熟

translation.en: Hey, what kind of panda are you?
translation.zh: 当熊猫这事我还真是不太熟 你算是哪门子的熊猫啊？

translation.en: You have a funny neck. I'm not a panda at all.
translation.zh: -你的脖子真奇葩-我根本就不是熊猫

translation.en: -What's that? What's that? -My hat. My beak. -What's that? -My wing.
translation.zh: -那是啥-我的帽子 我的嘴巴 我的翅膀

translation.en: No more questions! Go away, kid.
translation.zh: 你哪儿来那么多问题 你闪一边儿去

translation.en: Here, son. I packed your chopsticks. -Thanks, Dad. -Wow.
translation.zh: -儿子 我给你带了双筷子来-谢谢老爸

translation.en: These? These are chopsticks. They're for picking up dumplings.
translation.zh: 这个是筷子 用来夹包子的

translation.en: You mean you only eat one at a time?
translation.zh: 你是说 你一次只吃一个吗？

translation.en: I knew I wasn't eating up to my potential!
translation.zh: 我就知道我在吃这方面还有极大的潜力

translation.en: Wow, she's amazing. She's so beautiful.
translation.zh: 哇 她简直惊世骇俗 美若天仙

translation.en: But please, try to save all other compliments until after the performance.
translation.zh: 等人家表演完了再夸也不迟嘛

translation.en: Best ribbon dancer in the world!
translation.zh: 全天下属她的绸带舞跳得最好

translation.en: At least, that's what she said.
translation.zh: 反正她自己是这么说的
你实在忍不住 对吧？

translation.en: Dad, why does she keep staring at me like... that!
translation.zh: 老爸 怎么她老用那种眼神盯着我？

translation.en: I don't really know how to dance!
Of course, you do. All pandas dance.
translation.zh: 别骗人家 人家知道你一定会

translation.en: -I know what you were thinking. -You do?
translation.zh: -我知道你心里怎么想的-真的吗？

translation.en: "How can one panda be so beautiful?"
translation.zh: 如此美貌简直是仙熊下凡

translation.en: -Help me, Dads. -Yeah, no, you're on your own.
translation.zh: -老爸们快救我-这事儿得靠你自己

translation.en: Don't worry. You'll get the hang of it.
translation.zh: 别担心 你会掌握要领的

translation.en: I have so much to learn.
Just because you say "Wings of" before something, it doesn't mean that you're doing a special move.
translation.zh: 你加那么多高大上的形容词有什么用不就是俩破翅膀吗？

translation.en: It's like me saying "Antenna of Power"
translation.zh: 我学你啊 看我力拔山河之须

translation.en: Master Bear, Master Chicken, Master Croc! What are you doing out here?
translation.zh: 熊大师 鸡大师 鳄鱼大师你们怎么在这儿啊

translation.en: [squawks] Jade creatures attacked our villages. We've tracked them here.
translation.zh: 咕咕 翡尸攻击了我们的村子

translation.en: ...not to engage. -We've gotta get in there. -But Master Shifu said...
Even Master Chicken's going in there! And he's a chicken.
translation.zh: 连鸡大师都往里冲就他那点小鸡胆子

translation.en: -That's it. I'm going in. -Mantis! We have orders not to...
translation.zh: 废话少说 我进去了 -螳螂 咱们有命令在身-他们需要咱们的帮助 快

translation.en: They need our help! Come on. I'll go high, you go low.
translation.zh: -螳螂 咱们有命令在身-他们需要咱们的帮助 快 -我攻上 你攻下-等等
-坚持住 兄弟 我来啦-力拔山河之须

translation.en: Antenna of Power! Ah! It didn't work!
translation.zh: -坚持住 兄弟 我来啦-力拔山河之须 -啊 劲使大了-螳螂

translation.en: Just like your friend... the bug.
translation.zh: 和你那只虫子兄弟一样 小虫子

translation.en: I'll put your chi to good use...
destroying the Jade Palace and everyone in it.
translation.zh: 把翡翠宫弄个天翻地覆的

translation.en: Oh, yeah. First day of panda training!
translation.zh: 嗯 太棒了 第一天的熊猫训练课

translation.en: All right, flower. I'm gonna make you bloom.
translation.zh: 好了 小花花 我一定要让你绽放

translation.en: I'm ready for my first day of panda training.
translation.zh: -我准备好上第一堂熊猫训练课了-什么？

translation.en: -What? -You know, learn to be a panda, master chi, save the world!
translation.zh: 就是 成为真正的熊猫掌握气功 拯救世界
熊猫要睡到午后才能起床

translation.en: So lesson number one is, "Go back to bed."
translation.zh: 第一课就是回去好好睡

translation.en: Nobody said this was gonna be easy.
translation.zh: 没事 万事开头难嘛

translation.en: Can you do this? Can you do that?
How about this? How about that? Am I doing it? Is this good?
translation.zh: -那这招呢？这招呢？-我上道吗？我踢得好吗？
来 让我来 走你
-小心熊猫奶奶 头顶-大家好

translation.en: You gotta let the hill tell you where to roll.
translation.zh: 你要学会顺其自然才行哦
你要学会顺其自然才行哦 这下我懂了

translation.en: Dim, Sum, let's show him how we go uphill!
translation.zh: 乒乒 乓乓 我们教他上坡的秘诀

translation.en: What are you doing there? That food is for Po!
translation.zh: 你们干什么呢？ 这可是给阿宝准备的

translation.en: Just let yourself fall into it. Got it.
There we go. Just let it all out.
translation.zh: -我没事-吐吧 全都吐出来就好了
你个熊样 还挺腼腆

translation.en: Let me get some of that.

translation.zh: 这面条好好吃 再来一碗

translation.en: What are you guys looking at?
Now, you try again. But don't try so hard.
translation.zh: 现在 你再试试 不要那么用力

translation.en: You know, just for, you know, showing me what it feels like
translation.zh: 就是 谢谢你让我知道当一只熊猫

translation.en: -So, when do you think I'll be ready? -Ready?
translation.zh: -那么 你觉得我准备好了吗？-准备？

translation.en: You know, to learn how to master chi.
translation.zh: 当然是跟你学习气功了

translation.en: Come on, I wanna show you something else. Come on.
translation.zh: 跟我来 我给你看样东西 来吧

translation.en: Sorry about the mess. I don't usually get visitors.
translation.zh: 对不起 有点乱 家里一般没人来

translation.en: I had this done on your 100th day.
translation.zh: 这是你百日那天我找人画的

translation.en: Your momma couldn't hold you still.
It's true. What was she like?
She was the love of my life.
translation.zh: 她曾是我这辈子最爱的人

translation.en: And then, just when I thought I couldn't get any luckier,
translation.zh: 然后 就在我以为人生已然圆满时

translation.en: along you came. My Little Lotus.
translation.zh: 你又出生了 我的小莲花

translation.en: You don't have to worry about losing me ever again.
translation.zh: 你再也不用担心会失去我了

translation.en: Let me get some of that.
Master Lizard, Master Ox, Master Eagle. All of them.
translation.zh: 蜥蜴大师、公牛大师、飞鹰大师所有人

translation.en: In every village from the sea to here, every master in China...
translation.zh: 从海边到内陆的每个村庄 天底下所有的大师都失踪了
天底下所有的大师都失踪了

translation.en: -Maybe they are all at a party. -Monkey.
translation.zh: -他们可能集体赴宴去了-认真点

translation.en: I didn't get invited either. Kai has taken their chi.
translation.zh: -我也没有被邀请啊-是天煞收走了他们的气

translation.en: We are all that stand between him...
and the knowledge Oogway left in our care.
translation.zh: 靠我们几个乌龟大师的传人了
-村民们都疏散了吗？-是的 师父

translation.en: How dare you set foot on these grounds!

translation.zh: 看看你们这群可悲的蠢材

translation.en: Groveling at the feet of Oogway the Magnificent.
translation.zh: 在伟大的乌龟的脚下卑躬屈膝

translation.en: You are not fit to speak his name.
translation.zh: 你没有资格提他的名字

translation.en: I am not fit, little kitten?
translation.zh: 我没资格 小猫崽子？

translation.en: I loved him like a brother.
Well... Now I will destroy everything he has created!
translation.zh: 好吧 现在我要毁掉他亲手创造的一切

translation.en: How's that for a little kitten?
I will not let you destroy Oogway's memory.
translation.zh: 我绝不允许你毁掉乌龟建立的一切
凭什么？他毁了我的一切

translation.en: Mantis. It is me, your bestie!
translation.zh: 螳螂 是我呀 你的铁哥们
对不起 娇虎 对不起
对不起 娇虎 对不起 对不起 哦 对不起
对不起 哦 对不起
不 通知阿宝要紧 那你呢 师父？

translation.en: I will show you the true power of chi, brother.
translation.zh: 我来让你尝尝气的真正威力 兄弟

translation.en: [chuckles] Hmm, what do you say, Oogway?
You may have destroyed the Jade Palace, but you will never succeed.
translation.zh: 虽然你摧毁了翡翠宫但是你永远也别想得逞

translation.en: There will always be someone to stop you.
His chi is strong... but it won't be enough.
translation.zh: 他有再强大的气 也无法与我匹敌

translation.en: He will meet the same fate as you.
translation.zh: 他会跟你落得同样下场

translation.en: -No. -And so will every panda in that village.
translation.zh: 不 那个村子里所有熊猫也一样
阿宝 希望你准备好了
跳起来 小莲花 跳起来

translation.en: What are you doing here? Kai attacked the Valley.
translation.zh: -你怎么来了？-天煞袭击了村子

translation.en: He's taken every master in China, including Shifu and the others.
translation.zh: 他企图抓走天下所有的大师连师父也未能幸免 阿宝

translation.en: It's all gone, Po. Everything. Everyone.
translation.zh: 他企图抓走天下所有的大师连师父也未能幸免 阿宝 -他抓走了所有人-所有人？

translation.en: And now he's on his way here. He's after you, Po.
translation.zh: 现在他正朝这边杀来他是来抓你的 阿宝
-我们还有多长时间？-恐怕没多久了

translation.en: Please, tell me you've mastered chi.
translation.zh: 但愿你已经学会气功了

translation.en: Okay, who belongs to this one? You need to teach me the secret chi technique now!
translation.zh: -这是谁家的孩子？-赶紧把气功教给我

translation.en: No, no, I'm afraid you need more time.
translation.zh: 不行 我觉得时机还没到

translation.en: Everyone, go get your things! Let me help you with that.
translation.zh: 乡亲们 快去收拾行李

translation.en: I don't have more time. I need to learn it now!
translation.zh: 我没时间等了 我现在就得学
对不起 你还没准备好

translation.en: Okay, pack everything! -I am ready. -Not quite.
translation.zh: -大家把东西收拾好-我准备好了

translation.en: What are you talking about? I've done everything you've asked.
translation.zh: -还没有-你这是什么意思？ 你要求的事我都做到了我学会了打盹儿

translation.en: I've mastered napping, sleeping in, hammocks, hot tubs.
translation.zh: 你要求的事我都做到了我学会了打盹儿 睡懒觉 躺吊床 泡热水澡

translation.en: I am totally at one with my panda parts. Now why won't you show me?
translation.zh: 我浑身上下都已经协调一致了你为什么还是不肯教我？

translation.en: -You what? -I don't know it, okay? No one does.
translation.zh: -你说什么-我根本不会气功 明白吗？ 谁都不会 也许以前有人会但是早就失传了

translation.en: Maybe we used to. But... But not anymore.
translation.zh: 谁都不会 也许以前有人会但是早就失传了
你骗我？ 没有 我

translation.en: I find out some blade-swinging maniac is coming for you.
translation.zh: 我只知道有个挥着刀的疯子在追杀你

translation.en: What am I supposed to do? Just let that happen?
translation.zh: 我还能怎么办呢？袖手旁观吗？

translation.en: Yes! I'm the Dragon Warrior. Facing maniacs, that's my job!
translation.zh: 对啊 可我是神龙大侠 对付他 是我的职责

translation.en: But because of you, I left the Valley unprotected.
translation.zh: 但就因为你 我扔下整个村子不管

translation.en: I left my friends unprotected! And now they're all...
translation.zh: 我扔下朋友们不管 而现在他们都…

translation.en: -They're all... -And you would have been, too.
translation.zh: -他们都…-你要是留下 跟他们一个下场

translation.en: I am not going to lose you again.
Po, I'm so worried for you that I can't even enjoy being right about everything.
translation.zh: 阿宝 我早跟你说过 你不听现在也顾不上说这个了

translation.en: Now run, run, run, as fast as those chubby legs can go!
translation.zh: 快逃吧 甩开你肉墩墩的小短腿有多快跑多快

translation.en: But what are you going to do?
I'm gonna stay, and fight that monster.
translation.zh: 我要留下来 跟那个混蛋殊死一搏

translation.en: Po, he may be a monster, but he's still your father.
translation.zh: 阿宝 虽说他是个混蛋但好歹也是你亲爹呀
好吧 要不来一个吧

translation.en: You know, you weren't the only one who was lying.
translation.zh: 其实 撒谎的不止你一个呀

translation.en: because I was worried Po would go hungry.
translation.zh: 不是因为我担心阿宝会挨饿

translation.en: I was worried you'd steal Po from me.
translation.zh: 我担心的是 你把阿宝从我身边夺走
-什么？-我知道 那是瞎担心

translation.en: But I realize having you in Po's life doesn't mean less for me.
translation.zh: 但是我后来发现阿宝的生命中出现了你 这并不是我的损失

translation.en: Well, I'm not in his life.
translation.zh: 不过 他不再需要我了

translation.en: Your son got mad at you. Welcome to parenthood.
translation.zh: 对当爹的来说儿子生你的气太正常了

translation.en: You don't understand. I lied to him.
translation.zh: 没你想的这么简单 我骗了他呀

translation.en: I lied to him for 20 years.
He still thinks he came from an egg.
translation.zh: 他直到现在还以为自己是鹅蛋里孵出来的

translation.en: Sometimes, we do the wrong things for the right reasons.
translation.zh: 你知道有时候就是这样明明是好心 反而办了坏事

translation.en: And he still has to save the world.
translation.zh: 但他还要去拯救世界啊
这是他最需要我们的时候

translation.en: -This isn't going to work. -It has to.
translation.zh: 这样根本行不通 不行也得行
-你现在脑子不清醒-我很清醒
-你现在脑子不清醒-我很清醒 -不清醒-很清醒

translation.en: I've seen Kai. I've seen what he can do.
translation.zh: 我见过天煞 我知道他有多大本事

translation.en: But he hasn't seen what I can do.
translation.zh: 但他不知道我有多大本事啊

translation.en: It's my best move. I just have to get to Kai,
translation.zh: 这是我的绝技 我只要靠近天煞捏住他的手指然后 走你

translation.en: grab his finger and then skadoosh! Back to the Spirit Realm.
translation.zh: 我只要靠近天煞捏住他的手指然后 走你 他就滚回灵界了

translation.en: He has an army of jade warriors.
Everything they see, he sees. So there's no sneaking up on him.
translation.zh: 能帮他眼观六路 所以你没法偷袭他

translation.en: -You will never get close enough. -It's gonna work!
translation.zh: -你根本不可能近他的身-这招能行的

translation.en: He can only be stopped by a master of chi.
translation.zh: 只有气功大师才能阻止他

translation.en: Oh, you sound just like Shifu with the, "Chi, chi, chi."
translation.zh: 你跟师父一个腔调 气气气气
这也气 那也气 气气气

translation.en: I'm not a master of chi, okay?
translation.zh: 可我不是气功大师 好吗？

translation.en: I don't know if I'm the Dragon Warrior. I don't even know if I'm a panda!
translation.zh: 我也不知道自己配不配当神龙大侠 我甚至不知道自己是不是只熊猫

translation.en: I don't know who I am!
translation.zh: 我不知道自己到底是谁

translation.en: You're right. There's no way I can stop him and his army.
translation.zh: 你说得对我怎么可能阻止他的翡尸大军呢

translation.en: Unless you had an army of your own.
translation.zh: 除非你有一支自己的军队
是我们 我们所有人

translation.en: I finally found my son, after all these years.
translation.zh: 我费了这么多年时间终于能找到我的儿子

translation.en: It's going to take a lot more than the end of the world to keep us apart.
translation.zh: 哪怕山崩地裂我们两个也不会再分开了

translation.en: But you don't even know kung fu.
translation.zh: 可你们根本不会功夫啊

translation.en: What? I can't teach you kung fu.
translation.zh: 什么？我没法教你们功夫

translation.en: I couldn't even teach Tigress. And she already knows kung fu!
translation.zh: 像娇虎这种本来就会功夫的我都没法教她什么功夫呀

translation.en: Po, I know I'm the last guy you wanna trust right now.
translation.zh: 阿宝 我知道你现在最不信任的就是我

translation.en: But you gotta believe me. We can do this.
translation.zh: 但你必须相信我 我们能办到

translation.en: We can learn kung fu. We can be just like you!
translation.zh: 我们能学会功夫我们可以变成你那样

translation.en: Uh... "We can be just like you"?
translation.zh: -后面那句-呃 我们都可以变成你那样？

translation.en: But you don't have to be! That's what Shifu meant.
translation.zh: 但你们没必要像我一样原来师父是这个意思啊

translation.en: I don't have to turn you into me. I have to turn you into you!
translation.zh: 我不必让你们变成我而是要把你们变成你们自己

translation.en: That doesn't make any sense. I know!

translation.zh: 谢谢老爸们 -不客气-不客气

translation.en: I'm gonna do something I never thought I'd be able to do.
translation.zh: 我要做一件我以为自己永远都做不到的事情

translation.en: You guys, your real strength comes from being the best "you" you can be.
translation.zh: 伙计们 你们真正的力量来源于做最好的自己

translation.en: So who are you? What are you good at?
translation.zh: 那么你们又是谁呢？你们擅长什么？
快点 再快点 玩命挥舞这些绸子

translation.en: Hug that log like it's the last time you're ever gonna hug it goodbye forever.
translation.zh: 就当它是你最好的朋友永远不让它离开你的怀里

translation.en: Higher! And a little more to the left this time. You can do it!
translation.zh: 再高一点 这次稍偏左一点你能行的

translation.en: I don't wanna see any of these hit the ground!
translation.zh: 别让这些包子掉到地上
很好 换成这个试试

translation.en: Good! Now try it with these.
translation.zh: 很好 你再试试这个

translation.en: Okay, pay attention because I'm only gonna go over this ten more times.
translation.zh: 集合 注意听 重要的事我只说十遍

translation.en: The only entrance to the village is here.
translation.zh: 村子里唯一的入口在这里

translation.en: The dumpling squadron will take position here, while the cookie squadron will take position here.
translation.zh: 小笼包军团守在这里饼干小分队就守在这里

translation.en: Now, on my signal, the two squadrons will...
translation.zh: 听到我的指令之后 这两支小队就

translation.en: Okay. Anyway, the important thing to remember is that this is the spot where...
translation.zh: 好吧 没关系总之 务必要记住 在这个地方
好吧 我早就习惯了你们就一个任务

translation.en: If you only remember one thing, it's distract the jombies
translation.zh: 好吧 我早就习惯了你们就一个任务 全力缠住这些翡尸

translation.en: until I get close enough to put a Wuxi Finger Hold on Kai.
translation.zh: 给我机会接近天煞对他使出悟习铁指扣

translation.en: Pandas on three! One, two three, Pan...
translation.zh: 数到三喊熊猫加油一、二、三 熊…

translation.en: You guys... Never mind, I'll teach you that later.
translation.zh: 没关系 下次再教你们

translation.en: I wish I could have taught you this, son.
translation.zh: 我 我也希望能教你这个 儿子
没关系 老爸 我

translation.en: That's what I call a Dramatic Entrance!
translation.zh: 这个盛大出场可真盛大呀

translation.en: Ha ha! You must be the Dragon Warrior.
Beast of Vengeance, Maker of Widows!
translation.zh: 复仇之兽 夺命煞星
对 终于有人认识我了 谢谢你

translation.en: Almost makes me wanna spare your life. You wanna spare me?
translation.zh: -搞得我有点想饶你一命了-你想饶我一命？

translation.en: How about you spare me the chit-chat? All right? Let's do this.
translation.zh: 天煞也学会啰哩啰嗦了好了 放马过来吧

translation.en: I'm going to take your chi,
then the chi of every panda in the...

translation.zh: 啊 你这个又小又胖的

translation.en: You guys have all been turned green!
Except for you, Mantis. You were already green.
translation.zh: 除了你 螳螂 你本来就是绿的

translation.en: Spring Roll Squad! Time for some takeout!
translation.zh: 春卷特工队 去露一手吧
耶 哟吼 过来呀 翡尸大哥

translation.en: I don't know who you are, either.
Get ready to dance... with danger!
translation.zh: 准备被我完美的舞姿征服吧
-左边 老爸-谢啦 老爸
--注意右边 老爸-也谢谢你 老爸
--注意右边 老爸-也谢谢你 老爸 看我们的 儿子

translation.en: Sorry, buddy. Gotta send you back to the Spirit Realm.
translation.zh: 不好意思 哥们 我得送您回灵界了

translation.en: Okay, that didn't work. Let me try one more time.
translation.zh: 好吧 刚才没弄好 再来一次

translation.en: Skadoosh! Skadoosh. Skadoosh. Skadoo... What the...
translation.zh: 走你 走你 走你 走…
别急 等等 奏效了

translation.en: Did Oogway teach you that little trick? Too bad.
translation.zh: 这个小花招是乌龟教你的吗？真可惜

translation.en: And I am a Spirit Warrior.

translation.zh: 对不起 快跑 快跑

translation.en: So, Oogway, this was the one destined to stop me?
translation.zh: 嘿 乌龟 难道我宿命中的对手就是他吗？

translation.en: You really thought you could send me back to the Spirit Realm?
translation.zh: 你真以为能把我打回灵界吗？

translation.en: You are just a stupid mortal.
translation.zh: 你不过是个凡界的傻小子
这招只对凡界的人管用

translation.en: You're right. I can't send you there.
translation.zh: 你说得对 我没法把你打回灵界

translation.en: But I can take you there. What's that?
translation.zh: 但我可以带你去那儿 那是啥？

translation.en: He took Kai away. He saved us.
translation.zh: 他把天煞带走了 他救了我们

translation.en: He saved us, but who's saving him?
translation.zh: 他救了我们 可是谁去救他呀？

translation.en: Whoa! The Spirit Realm. It worked!
translation.zh: 哇 灵界 我成功啦

translation.en: Don't blame me. I tried to finish this in the regular realm.
translation.zh: 这能怪我吗？我也想在凡界了结战斗的
那我们就在这里了结吧
加油 儿子 跟他拼了

translation.en: We have to help him! Okay. Everyone gather around.
translation.zh: 我们得去帮帮他好了 大家伙 靠过来

translation.en: That's it. Come in close. Come on. We can do this.
translation.zh: 没错 靠近点 加油 咱们能行

translation.en: [Li] Po... You taught us who we were meant to be.
translation.zh: 阿宝 你带领我们找到了自我

translation.en: A dumpling kicker. A lethal fighting machine.
I've been asking the same question.
translation.zh: 我也一直问自己这个问题

translation.en: Am I the son of a panda?
Turns out... I'm all of them.
Get it? See the giant dragon?
translation.zh: 懂了吗？看见这条巨龙了吗？

translation.en: Get ready to feel the thunder.
Perhaps a bit of lunch. Because I'm starving.
translation.zh: 要不咱先垫垫肚子吧 我都饿扁了

translation.en: It took me 500 years to take Oogway's chi.
translation.zh: 为了夺走乌龟的气 我修炼了五百年

translation.en: I will have yours if it takes me 500 more.
translation.zh: 为你我愿意再花五百年
啰里啰唆 啰里 啰唆

translation.en: You want my chi so bad...

translation.zh: 好啊 你的气终于是我的了
等等 停下 太多了
太多了 不 不要

translation.en: I'm still green! It didn't work!
translation.zh: 我还是绿的 那招不好使啊

translation.en: Oh, wait. That's my normal green.
translation.zh: 哦 等等 我平时就这么绿

translation.en: Greeny Baby! Not a baby. Not a baby!
Have you seen Po? No. He's not here?
translation.zh: -你们看到阿宝了吗？-没有啊 他不在这儿吗？
不会吧 简直跟做梦一样

translation.en: As are you. I know, right? It's like the best cape ever.
translation.zh: -你也是-是吧 我这件披风超棒的

translation.en: When I run with it, then it looks really cool.
translation.zh: 我穿着它跑起来的时候很帅
你穿着很合身 你长大啦

translation.en: Yep. I gotta lay off the panda buffet.
translation.zh: 是吧 其实也没长大 就是吃胖了

translation.en: as I hoped you would when I sent the message to your father.
translation.zh: 正如我通知你父亲时所期望的那样

translation.en: [gasps] You sent the universe mail. Whoa!
translation.zh: 原来那条来自宇宙的消息是你发的 哇

translation.en: Yes. Because the universe needed you.
translation.zh: 对 因为宇宙需要你

translation.en: You finally became the panda you were always meant to be.
translation.zh: 你终于成为了命中注定的那只熊猫

translation.en: But, how'd you know I could?
translation.zh: 可你怎么知道我能做到呢？

translation.en: On the first day we met,
translation.zh: 在我们初次见面的那天

translation.en: I saw the future of kung fu.
I saw the panda who could unite them both.
translation.zh: 我看到了一只能将两者合二为一的熊猫

translation.en: That is why I chose you, Po.
translation.zh: 所以我才选择了你 阿宝

translation.en: Both sides of a Yin and Yang.
Just take it. I have a bigger one.
translation.zh: 你就拿着吧 我还有个更大的

translation.en: I mean, you're enlightened and everything. I'm just...
translation.zh: 我是说 您都已经开悟了 而我
不 乌龟 你别走

translation.en: I'm not going anywhere. I live here.
translation.zh: 我哪儿都不去 我就住这儿

translation.en: It's you who must decide whether to stay or go.
translation.zh: 要决定去留的是你自己
谁知道呢？我从来没试过
老爸 老爸 老爸们

translation.en: Don't you go disappearing in petals ever again.
translation.zh: 以后可不许钻花瓣里玩消失了啊
我们还以为失去你了呢

translation.en: The student has truly become the tea...
translation.zh: 学生终于修炼成了老师

translation.en: Wait. Where did you get that?
translation.zh: 等等 这是哪儿来的？

translation.en: Oh, this. Oogway gave it to me in the Spirit Realm.
translation.zh: 哦 这个吗？是乌龟在灵界传给我的
